item.title: MSSQL 雜記
item.description: 查詢執行很久的SQL SELECT TOP 10 [總執行時間(秒)] =CAST(a.total_elapsed_time / 1000000.0 AS DECIMAL(16, 2)) , [執行次數] =a.execution_count , [平均執行時間(秒)] =CAST(a.total_elapsed_time / 1000000.0 / a.execution_count AS DECIMAL(16, 2)) , [SQL指令] =SUBSTRING (b.text,(a.statement_start_offset/2) + 1,500) FROM sys.dm_exec_query_stats a CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(a.sql_handle) as b WHERE a.total_elapsed_time > 0 AND B.[text] NOT LIKE '%SCHEMA_NAME%'--去除一些系統的SQL指令 ORDER BY [平均執行時間(秒)] DESC 查詢資料庫版本 SELECT @@VERSION AS 'SQL Server Version Details' 查詢結果 Microsoft SQL Server 2014 - 12.0.2000.8 (X64) Feb 20 2014 20:04:26 Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation Standard Edition (64-bit) on Windows NT 6.
